00022 #ifndef HOMHILOCELLISTENER_H
00023 #define HOMHILOCELLISTENER_H
00024 //
00025 #include "chipstream/BioTypes.h"
00026 #include "chipstream/CelListener.h"
00027 #include "chipstream/ChipSummary.h"
00028 #include "chipstream/GenoUtility.h"
00029 #include "chipstream/ProbeListFactory.h"

00039 /**
00040  * @brief Class for computing hilo qc metric from a cel set of cel files.
00041  */
00042 class HomHiLoCelListener : public ChipSummary, public CelListener {
00043 
00044 public:
00045 
00046   /** 
00047    * Constructor.
00048    * @param probeSets - Vector of probesets to compute metric on
00049    */
00050   HomHiLoCelListener(std::vector<ProbeListPacked> &probeSets, 
00051                      std::string label = "minhilo",
00052                      double k = 2.0f, 
00053                      double emThresh = 0.05f,
00054                      double binSize = 0.02f) : 
00055       m_ProbeSets(probeSets), 
00056       m_K(k), 
00057       m_EmThresh(emThresh), 
00058       m_BinSize(binSize),
00059       m_Label(label) 
00060   {
00061     declareMetric(m_Label,ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00062   }
00063 
00064   
00065   /**
00066    * Virtual destructor.
00067    */
00068   virtual ~HomHiLoCelListener(){}
00069   
00070   /** 
00071    * Process another std::vector<double> worth of data.
00072    * @param vData - The std::vector<double> of data to process.
00073    * @param dEmThreshold - The EM Threshold.
00074    * @param dBinSize - The Bin Size.
00075    * @return - The statistic.
00076    */
00077   static double computeStatistic(std::vector<double>& vData, double dEmThreshold = 0.05f, double dBinSize = 0.04f);
00078 
00079   /** 
00080    * Process another cel files worth of data.
00081    * @param cel - Filehandle to open cel file.
00082    */
00083   void newChip(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel);
00084 
00085   /** 
00086    * Get the names for the cel files that have been seen.
00087    * @return - vector of cel file names, one for each cel file in order seen.
00088    */
00089   std::vector<std::string> getCelNames() {
00090     return m_CelNames;
00091   }
00092 
00093   /** 
00094    * Loop through the probesets provided and calculate a contrast value
00095    * for each one using the median of PM probes for A allele and B
00096    * allele. (CES constrast space)
00097    * @param cel - Cel File to get data from.
00098    * @param chrXProbeSets - Probesets to process (should be chrX non-pseudo autosomal).
00099    * @param contrastValues - Contrast values vector to be filled in.
00100    */
00101   static void fillInContrastValues(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel, 
00102                                    std::vector<ProbeListPacked> &chrXProbeSets, 
00103                                    std::vector<double> &contrastValues, 
00104                                    double k = 2);
00105   /**
00106    * Calculate contrast values
00107    */
00108   static double CalculateEMContrast(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData* cel, 
00109                                     const ProbeSet* ps, 
00110                                     const double k = 2);
00111 
00112   /**
00113    * Compute the cluster peaks using EM
00114    */
00115   static void computeClusterPeaks(vector<double> &contrastValues, 
00116                                     double &peak1, 
00117                                     double &peak2, 
00118                                     double &peak3, 
00119                                     double emThresh = 0.05,
00120                                                                         double dMinMu = 0.25);
00121 
00122   /**
00123    * Compute the Valley Between Two Points
00124    */ 
00125   static double computeClusterValleyFixedEndPoint(const std::vector<double>& contrast, 
00126                                      double x1, 
00127                                      double x2, 
00128                                      double bin = 0.02);
00129 
00130   /**
00131    * Compute the Valley Between Two Points
00132    */ 
00133   static double computeClusterValley(const std::vector<double>& contrast, 
00134                                      double x1, 
00135                                      double x2, 
00136                                      double bin = 0.02);
00137 
00138   /**
00139    * Compute the density of values for a given bin
00140    */
00141   static double getContrastDensity(const std::vector<double>& contrast, 
00142                                 double x, 
00143                                 double bin = 0.02);
00144   /**
00145    * Fit the model N(-delta,sigma), N(0,K*sigma), N(delta,sigma)
00146    * using EM to calculate parameters sigma, delta, P, K
00147    */
00148   static void computeMixtureModel(const std::vector<double>& xdata,
00149                                   double& sigma,
00150                                   double& delta,
00151                                   double& P,
00152                                   double& K,
00153                                   bool symmetrize   = true,
00154                                   double sigmaInit  = 0.2,
00155                                   double deltaInit  = 1.0,
00156                                   double PInit      = 0.6,
00157                                   double KInit      = 0.2);
00158 
00159    /**
00160     * Calculate snpqc metric
00161     */
00162    static float computeSNPQC(const vector<double>& xdata, bool symmetrize = true);
00163 
00164 private:
00165 
00166   /**
00167    * Helper functions for computeMixtureModel()
00168    */
00169   static double logLikelihood(const std::vector<double>& xdata,
00170                               double sigma,
00171                               double delta,
00172                               double P,
00173                               double K);
00174 
00175   static double mixSum(double x, double sigma, double delta, double P, double K);
00176   static double dnorm(double x, double sigma, double delta);
00177 
00178 protected:
00179 
00180   /// Vector of probesets to compute HiLo on
00181   /// Pointer memory is owned elsewhere...
00182   std::vector<ProbeListPacked> m_ProbeSets;
00183   /// Name of the cel files that have been called.
00184   std::vector<std::string> m_CelNames;
00185   /// Our K parameter for the contrast centers transformation.
00186   double m_K; 
00187   /// EM Threshold to use
00188   double m_EmThresh;
00189   /// Size of contrast bins
00190   double m_BinSize;
00191   /// Label for the chip summary output
00192   std::string m_Label;
00193 };

00195 #endif /* HOMHILOCELLISTENER_H */
